mapper.insert: insert into notice (title, content, user_id) values (#{title}, #{content}, #{userID})
mapper.update: update notice set title=#{title}, content=#{content} where noticeNum=#{noticeNum}
mapper.select: select noticeNum, title, content, user_id AS userID, reg_date AS regDate from notice where noticeNum > 0 order by noticeNum desc, regDate desc
select noticeNum, title, content, user_id AS userID, reg_date As regDate form notice where noticeNum > 0 oreder by noticeNum desc, regDate desc limit #{page}, 10
select noticeNum, title, content, user_id AS userID, reg_date As regDate from notice where noticeNum > 0 order by noticeNum desc, regDate desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
select count(noticeNum) from notice where noticeNum > 0
